name: Sofia
description:
Sofia- It is a single player third person action game, featuring melee combat with different fighting styles. It takes place in an incident that causes the connection between stories. The story follows Sofia, the girl and José, each one comes from a different story, they will have their virtues but also their traumas and they will have to be fought.
To face the confrontations, it has a combat system as simple as it is- Attack, block and dodge- As you level up each character, skills will be unlocked that you will have to take advantage of to face the enemy.

History
  • Follow in the footsteps of Sofia, the girl, and José, in this chaotic incident where everything changes and is rewritten. Untangle Sofia's past with the memories that still remain in her memory and flee from that empty place where she woke up.


fragments
It has multiple stories that in the end are interconnected with another, everything happens for a reason.
  • Decipher each memory, so that the story makes some sense.

rpg system
As you defeat enemies, you will unlock skills to deal with situations.
  • Weak, strong attacks (Combos)
  • Special, mega, and super attacks
  • Completions (Only some characters have that ability)
  • Slow down time
  • And more.....


shop
  • Buy characters with different fighting styles, outfits, etc.
    (Everything is achieved with in-game money.)


collectibles
  • When you defeat enemies you will gain experience and coins to unlock collectibles +18
